title: How has Steph Curry playing style evolved as he’s aged?
text:
Steph Curry has not changed due to his age. Steph Curry is the best.


Code
library(tidyverse)
library(ggalt)
library(ggtext)

rookie <- tibble(
  stat = c("Points per Game", "3PA per Game", "3P%", "Usage Rate", "Assists", "FG%"),
  rookie = c(6.6, 4.8, 43.7, 21.2, 5.9, 46.2),
  current = c(8.7, 11.8, 40.8, 31.6, 5.1, 45.0)
)

ggplot(rookie, aes(x = rookie, xend = current, y = stat)) +
  geom_dumbbell(color = "black", 
                size = 3,
                colour_x = "blue",  
                colour_xend = "yellow") +  
  labs(title = "Has Steph Curry's age stopped him?",
       subtitle = "21 years old and 37 years old",
       x = "Stat Value",
       y = NULL,
       caption = "By: Natalia Guerrera 
       Source: Sports Reference") +
  theme_minimal()











Code
library(waffle)
library(tidyverse)
library(patchwork)


rookie <- c(`FG%` = 46, `3P%` = 44, `FT%` = 89)
current <- c(`FG%` = 45, `3P%` = 41, `FT%` = 92)


rookie_waffle <- waffle(rookie, rows = 10, 
                        colors = c("red", "orange", "darkgreen"),
                        title = "Rookie Season (2009–10)")

current_waffle <- waffle(current, rows = 10, 
                         colors = c("red", "orange", "darkgreen"),
                         title = "2023–24 Season")


rookie_waffle + current_waffle











Code
curry_scatter <- tibble(
  Season = c("Rookie", "2023–24"),
  Attempts = c(380, 800),
  Percent = c(43.7, 40.8)
)

ggplot(curry_scatter, aes(x = Attempts, y = Percent, color = Season)) +
  geom_point(size = 5) +
  geom_text(aes(label = Season),
            nudge_y = c(0.6, -0.6),
            fontface = "bold") +
  labs(
    title = "Steph Curry: 3PA vs. 3P%",
    x = "3-Point Attempts",
    y = "3-Point Percentage (%)",
    color = "Season"
  ) +
  scale_y_continuous(limits = c(35, 47)) +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(plot.title = element_text(size = 16, face = "bold"))
